Review Text: It was our first time eating Indonesian food and everything was super delicious. We were able to taste so many dishes and it's a great way be introduced to all the different flavours. Staff was really friendly and the place has a great ‚Ä¶

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: Friendly and welcoming staff, nice warmly decorated restaurant. The staff gladly helps you make a decision out of the menu and explains dishes if needed. Top service! The dishes are really nice and tasty, there's a lot to try. Price/quality a very good deal.

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: Great food!!!! And friendly service. The rijstafels are amazing

Name: Tashi Deleg

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: delicious food, big variety, super friendly staff, just ask if you are vegan, they are very helpful and provide vegan options

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: What can I say? The food and service were amazing. Our first time having Tibetan food and they weren't disappointing. Not super spicy, packed with flavour and that fried bread....wow.

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: If you are in Amsterdam, one thing you have to try is indonesian food. In particular there is a tastaing menu called rijsttafel or rice table. The Dutch adapted this dish in colonial times and it is very popular. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: Best food I have ate in a while! Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Amsterdam, especially the momos were amazing! Will definitely visit again.

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text:
Excellent experience!

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: Delicious and artfully prepared cuisine. Very friendly and personal service. Warm and authentic atmosphere. Highly recommended.

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: Had the best tasting experience in this restaurant. All of the presented dished were so delicious, I would recommend everyone to try their Tibetan cuisine!

Review Text: After scouring the restaurant listings for Amsterdam we chose Tashi Deleg based on reviews and the menu. What a great decision.  This is a small restaurant, decorated tastefully and has a cosy atmosphere. The service was outstanding; ‚Ä¶

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: It was the 1st time my boyfriend and I have tried Indonesian food. We had a lovely moment, the food was amazing, very tasty and varied and the service also super nice. I'll definitely bring my people there!

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: One of our favorite restaurants in Amsterdam! We have been here several times now and the food has always been great! Portions are good, personnel is amazing and wine is of good quality. Definitely recommend this place!

Name: Tashi Deleg
Review Text: Good but not exceptional food. We had the Indonesian shared menu with 8 dishes to share for two for 24.50 per person. Not spicy. Some delicious some so-so. Overall recommended.

Review Text:
